mapper.update: update freeboard set title = #{title}, writer = #{writer}, contents = #{contents} where board_no = #{board_no} and pwd = #{pwd}
mapper.delete: delete from freeboard where board_no = #{board_no} and pwd = #{pwd}
mapper.insert: insert into freeboard (title, writer, pwd, contents, write_date) values( #{title}, #{writer}, #{pwd}, #{contents}, now() );
mapper.select: select board_no, title, writer, write_date from freeboard
